summary: Tony stark x female peter parker: number 3
question: Tony stark x female peter parker: number 3
answer:
I have a weird thing with genderbending, so see this as more of a femmeboy Peter :)

3. who is the most romantic? 

Depends on how you view ‘romantic’; they’re both romantic in different ways, and probably not in the traditional sense. Tony, who can’t even remember what he had for breakfast, always remembers when Peter’s got a difficult exam or notices when he’s stressed, and takes the time to go out and get him something personally, be it a new lipstick that compliments his skin tony or that cute skirt he’s been eyeing. Peter makes sure Tony’s knows he’s loved after a lifetime of being solitary, constantly hugging him, taking him food when he hasn’t eaten, nagging at him to come to bed, telling him he’s beautiful 

send me a number and a ship and I’ll tell you my hc :)

blog.name: storychecker
blog.title: StoryChecker
blog.description: A blog dedicated to essays about literature, video games, movies, and TV. Searching for the deep in popular culture.

title: Far From Home Trailer
body:
I really don’t get any grief vibes from the trailer. Peter doesn’t seem particularly sad. Yes,he decides against the suit, but before that, he is swinging around. Carefree. Sure, Tony’s not there, but I don’t buy into the “he died and Peter learns to cope” story. Then I stopped at this particular frame:

Oh, hello. I wonder about the peanut gallery up there. The one that is filled with a very specific number of uninvited guests. In the middle, there are four kids, probably Ned, MJ, the new kid in their circle of friends who looks like a young Doctor Li and the blond girl from the trailer. But on the left, there’s a couple hidden away in the shadows. There are not a lot of people in the MCU who dare to wear white from top to bottom. One is this particular lady:

It also makes sense, because she is the one who signed the huge donation, as “Co-founder and Chair: Stark Relief Foundation.” Gee, I wonder who that guy on her left could be. The one who is about the same height as her, seeing as that both of them must be standing. There are no chairs between the rows. My guess is the one and only Tony Stark.

Now, one could claim that it is Happy. However, Happy is actually way taller than her:

Notice how Happy has to look down and she is actually looking up? That’s with high heels, mind you. The difference behind the scenes is even bigger:

So, maybe there is a glimpse of the happy couple in the trailer? It’s at least a nice thought to tide myself over until Endgame. Sure, Pepper signed the donation with the last name “Potts”. But since she also signed as “Pepper” rather than “Virginia”, there might be some wiggle room left to argue for misleading information. Besides, there’s a lot of white space on that line to allow for trickery.

summary:
Peter, visibly sweating: you look really pretty 
MJ: and therefore I have value? 
Peter, panicking: w-? N-no-that’s not...
body:
Peter, visibly sweating: you look really pretty

MJ: and therefore I have value?

Peter, panicking: w-? N-no-that’s not what-

MJ: I’m messing with you. You look really pretty too.

Peter: OH THANK GOD

summary: I hope tony dies. I love him and if rdj will quit playing him, he deserves a legendary tribute. If he retires and steps down...
question: I hope tony dies. I love him and if rdj will quit playing him, he deserves a legendary tribute. If he retires and steps down from being Iron Man, that would be so UN-TONY.
answer: i dont think it would, if we’re talking mcu. he was in the process of quitting / retiring since iron man 3. if purple daddy panini chin and his gang of sewer dwellers didnt show up, he’d be retired and not an active member of avengers or shield, at least not as Iron Man, as we could gather from infinity war the movie. if they dont have him retire in that way in endgame, then all that build-up was pointless and i doubt they’d ditch their main characters story like that But God Knows at this point

summary: Hold on but what if Tony is not in the FFH trailer because he and Pepper are on their honeymoon but nobody knows exactly where...
body:
Hold on but what if Tony is not in the FFH trailer because he and Pepper are on their honeymoon but nobody knows exactly where the fuck they are because Tony wanted some time off from superhero duty and just fled with the love of his life?

And then he’s gonna show up at the end of the movie just to scream in Fury’s face to never try to talk to his Peter ever again

summary: Broken But For A Few Crumbs
title: Broken But For A Few Crumbs
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FzBPF2

by Buckets_Of_Stars

All Peter wanted was a cookie from the top shelf. That’s it. Now, on top of interrupting Tony in a very important meeting, the boy has a broken hand and a very worried father he has to deal with.

Oh, boy is he screwed.

summary: Twitter: Tony Stark must be dead because it’s Pepper’s signature on the giant check.  Me: But she’s the CEO. There are reasons...
body:

summary: Tony's Cameo in Far From Home
title: Tony's Cameo in Far From Home
body:
Aunt May: Okay you have your passport, spider suit, snack, snacks, MORE s, phone charger, money.
Peter: Yes, May for the eight time I got everything.
Aunt May: Okay good! Have a safe trip.
Peter: Bye May!
Aunt May:....feel like he's forgetting something.
Tony: Yeah he's forgetting me but he's a big boy now I have faith in him.

dialogue.label: Aunt May:

What if tony just fakes his own death so he and pepper can retire to a farm?
Everyone thinks tony is dead so they finally leave...
body:
What if tony just fakes his own death so he and pepper can retire to a farm?

Everyone thinks tony is dead so they finally leave him the fuck alone. Nick fury has experience with that… he could help
